titles.title: Providing for an adjournment or recess of the two Houses.
Providing for an adjournment or recess of the two Houses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 204 - 169 (Roll no. 527).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from October 9 or 10, 2004, until November 16, 2004, and a recess or an adjournment of the Senate on any day from October 9 through 15, 2004, until November 15 or 16, 2004.
